1.definition: a particular detail, proposition, or issue of law

2.definition: any of various incremental units used in measuring, fixing, or calculating something

sub_terms.a: a unit used in calculating a sentence by various factors (as aggravating or mitigating circumstances)
sub_terms.b: a unit used in the pricing of securities and valuation of markets
sub_terms.c: a charge to a borrower (as a mortgagor) that is equal to one percent of the principal and that is made at closing
